name: Tourist
desc: This is the most common, which allows travelers to visit a country for tourism purposes. It typically has a limited validity period and may have restrictions on the duration of stay.

name: Business
desc: Business type are issued to individuals traveling for business purposes such as meetings, conferences, or negotiations. They may require additional documentation, such as an invitation letter from a host company.

name: Student
desc: Student type are granted to students who plan to pursue their education in a foreign country. These visas are typically issued for a specific educational institution and have restrictions related to study programs

name: Work
desc: Work type are issued to individuals who have secured employment in a foreign country. They permit individuals to work legally within the designated timeframe and often require sponsorship from an employer.

name: Medical
desc: Medical type are designed for individuals seeking medical treatment or procedures abroad. They may require supporting medical documentation and an invitation letter from a recognized medical institution.

name: Transit
desc: Transit type are for travelers passing through a country en route to their final destination. They are typically valid for a short period and allow a limited stay for the purpose of transit.
